title: Crash with Generic Function

milestone.title: Data Structures 3 - Traits
milestone.description:
This is a milestone target for preliminary support of traits which is going to depend on the work from generics. This is a complex task to get right. https://doc.rust-lang.org/rust-by-example/trait.html

Lifetime arguments may be ignored in this.

body:
@flip1995 made an interesting test case for generics not quite sure why this is crashing yet.

```rust
struct S;

fn foo<S>(s: S) -> S {
    s
}

fn main() {
    let _s: S = foo(S);
}
```

